Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a powerful technology for heat and power generation that can be combined with many applications.
Titulo: Analysis of the Ca-looping sorption-enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell integrated process using bio-oil

Sentencas: This study presents a thermodynamic analysis of the Ca-looping sorption enhanced steam reforming (SESR) of bio-oil integrated with an SOFC.
Titulo: Analysis of the Ca-looping sorption-enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell integrated process using bio-oil

Sentencas: Acetic acid is used as a model compound to represent a bio-oil aqueous fraction.
Titulo: Analysis of the Ca-looping sorption-enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell integrated process using bio-oil

Sentencas: Useful heat from an SOFC is utilized in the regenerator to improve the performance of the SOFC system.
Titulo: Analysis of the Ca-looping sorption-enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell integrated process using bio-oil

Sentencas: The effects of key parameters in operating the Ca-looping sorption-enhanced steam reformer and SOFC are discussed.
Titulo: Analysis of the Ca-looping sorption-enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell integrated process using bio-oil

Sentencas: The results indicate that Ca-looping SESR integrated with SOFC has a higher performance than the conventional process.
Titulo: Analysis of the Ca-looping sorption-enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell integrated process using bio-oil

Sentencas: Increasing the SESR temperature, the CaO/fuel ratio, the SOFC temperature, and the fuel utilization increases the electrical efficiency, but it decreases with S/F ratio.
Titulo: Analysis of the Ca-looping sorption-enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell integrated process using bio-oil

Sentencas: Regarding an energy analysis, the regenerator requires higher energy when it operates at a high steam and CaO/fuel ratio but lower energy when it operates at high SESR temperatures.
Titulo: Analysis of the Ca-looping sorption-enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell integrated process using bio-oil

Sentencas: In addition, the system efficiency of the SOFC integrated process decreases with SESR temperature and steam due to the high amount of energy to feed and air preheating.
Titulo: Analysis of the Ca-looping sorption-enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell integrated process using bio-oil

Sentencas: Heat integration using the pinch analysis method to certify the maximum heat recovery improves the system efficiency.
Titulo: Analysis of the Ca-looping sorption-enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell integrated process using bio-oil
